Sure Start
Sure Start is a government 
programme funded by the 
Department of Education 
which provides a range of 
support services for parents 
with children under the age of 
four. There are 38 Sure Start 
projects in Northern Ireland, 
covering at least the top 20% 
most disadvantaged wards.
Sure Start projects deliver a 
wide variety of programmes 
to parents and children, 
which are designed  to 
support preschool childrenâ€™s
